Translations.Text: Ih, arbaa segsen ssexsaoen Tazmamt s yilsawen nnsen, iwakken a p$ilem n Tezmamt, ayen ur nelli n Tezmamt. Qqaoen: "aya s$uo Oebbi", u neppa ur illi s$uo Oebbi. U qqaren tikerkas $ef Oebbi, u nitni eoan
Ur ippunefk ara i umdan iwumi Ifka Oebbi Tazmamt, uuwab, u Irra t d nnbi, ad iu$al ad yini i medden: "ilit d imdanen iw, war Oebbi". Maca: "ilit d iselmaden, imi tesselmadem Tazmamt, u tlemdem
Ur awen Iumeo ara a pperrem lmalayek akked lambiyya, d imawlan. Day awen Iameo tijehli, mbaad ma tellam d imvuaen
